scripts.pretest: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && gulp rollup
scripts.prepare: npm run test && uglifyjs dist/d3-heatmap.js -c -m -o dist/d3-heatmap.min.js && cp src/heatmap.css dist/d3-heatmap.css
scripts.postpublish: zip -j dist/d3-heatmap.zip -- LICENSE README.md dist/d3-heatmap.js dist/d3-heatmap.min.js dist/d3-heatmap.css
